effect_size: Large for both (d=0.94 arthritis, d=1.12 depression)
participants: 142 adults with RA or PsA and comorbid depression (PHQ-9 ≥10)
notes: Cannabidiol for Inflammatory Arthritis and Depression Comorbidity: RCT
abstract: CBD: DAS28-CRP reduced 36% (4.8 → 3.1), PHQ-9 reduced 52% (14.2 → 6.8); Placebo: DAS28 reduced 15%, PHQ-9 reduced 21%; both p<0.001
